thread.title: This is pretty cool
thread.title_full: This is pretty cool - Review of The Renwick Hotel New York City, Curio Collection by Hilton, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Christopher W
title: This is pretty cool
text: We just checked in and this hotel is very cool. Funky and artsy, practical and useful. Nick the bellman is THE most helpful bellman we've ever had. He explained the history of the hotel, made sure we knew the features of the room and were settled in. Judy at the front desk was prompt and friendly. Really great experience so far.
